YOU WAIVE JURY TRIAL & CLASS ACTIONS

These Terms contain a binding arbitration agreement, class action waiver, and extreme limitations on liability ‚Äî including complete disclaimer of responsibility for stolen, leaked, breached, hacked, or lost data. By using VehicleDiary you agree to all terms herein.

data.name: Section1_Title
data.value: 1. ACCOUNT & CREDENTIALS ‚Äì YOUR LIABILITY

data.name: Section1_Content
data.value: You are solely responsible for all activity under your VehicleDiary account, including any vehicle data, modifications, service records, parts inventory, and investment calculations. We are not liable for unauthorized access resulting from compromised passwords, phishing, credential stuffing, or your failure to implement adequate security measures. If you share your login, you assume all risk.

data.name: Section2_Title
data.value: 2. VEHICLE DATA & CONTENT

data.name: Section2_Content
data.value: You retain full ownership of all vehicle information, photos, VINs, receipts, and valuations (‚ÄúUser Content‚Äù). By submitting User Content, you grant VehicleDiary a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, royalty‚Äëfree license to store, backup, process, and display such data solely to provide and improve the Service. We do not claim ownership, but you authorize us to transmit and store your data across global servers and third‚Äëparty infrastructure.

data.name: Section3_Title
data.value: 3. NO LIABILITY FOR DATA THEFT, LOSS, OR BREACH

data.name: Section3_Content
data.value:
// COMPLETE DISCLAIMER ‚Äì ‚ÄúSTOLED‚Äù DATA, HACKS, LEAKS, RANSOMWARE, INSIDER THREATS

3.1 YOU ASSUME ALL SECURITY RISKS.

VehicleDiary uses commercially reasonable physical and electronic safeguards; however, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure. We do not guarantee that our security measures will prevent unauthorized access, theft, loss, corruption, or destruction of your User Content or any other data. You acknowledge that breaches, hacking, ransomware, insider misconduct, and other malicious events may occur despite our efforts.

3.2 EXPRESS WAIVER FOR BREACH / THEFT.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, VehicleDiary, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents shall not be liable for any unauthorized access to, use of, disclosure, alteration, loss, or destruction of User Content or other data, regardless of the cause (including negligence, gross negligence, or willful misconduct of our personnel or contractors). You irrevocably waive any claims against us arising from data that is ‚Äústoled,‚Äù stolen, hacked, leaked, exfiltrated, or otherwise compromised.

‚∏ª This provision survives termination of your account or these Terms.

data.name: Section4_Title
data.value: 4. INVESTMENT CALCULATIONS ‚Äì ‚ÄúAS IS‚Äù

data.name: Section4_Content
data.value: VehicleDiary provides automated tools to estimate total vehicle investment based on data you enter. We do not warrant accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any calculation, depreciation curve, market valuation, or cost projection. Figures are for informational purposes only and should not be used for insurance, tax, financing, or legal decisions. You bear all risk of relying on such calculations.

data.name: Section5_Title
data.value: 5. NO WARRANTIES ‚Äì SERVICE ‚ÄúAS IS‚Äù

data.name: Section5_Content
data.value: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED ‚ÄúAS IS‚Äù AND ‚ÄúAS AVAILABLE‚Äù WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON‚ÄëINFRINGEMENT, OR SECURITY. VehicleDiary does not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, error‚Äëfree, or free of viruses or other harmful components. Some jurisdictions do not allow the disclaimer of implied warranties, so such disclaimers may not apply to you.

data.name: Section6_Title
data.value: 6. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY ‚Äì NOTHING RECOVERABLE

data.name: Section6_Content
data.value: To the fullest extent permitted by law, in no event shall VehicleDiary or its related parties be liable for (i) any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, punitive, or exemplary damages, (ii) any loss of data, use, goodwill, profits, or investment, or (iii) any costs of substitute services, even if advised of the possibility of such damages. Our aggregate liability to you for any claim arising from or relating to these Terms or the Service shall not exceed the greater of $10.00 USD or the amount you paid us in the twelve months preceding the claim. This cap applies to all causes of action, including contract, tort, negligence, strict liability, and statutory claims.

data.name: Section7_Title
data.value: 7. INDEMNITY ‚Äì YOU DEFEND & HOLD HARMLESS

data.name: Section7_Content
data.value: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless VehicleDiary, its parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys‚Äô fees) arising out of or relating to (a) your User Content, (b) your use of the Service, (c) your violation of these Terms, or (d) any actual or alleged infringement of any third‚Äëparty rights. We reserve the right to assume exclusive defense and control of any matter subject to indemnification by you, at your expense.

data.name: Section8_Title
data.value: 8. BINDING ARBITRATION & CLASS ACTION WAIVER

data.name: Section8_Content
data.value: Any dispute, claim, or controversy arising out of or relating to these Terms or the Service shall be resolved by binding individual arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association under its Consumer Arbitration Rules. The arbitration shall be held in the county of our principal place of business, or remotely by mutual consent. YOU AGREE THAT YOU MAY BRING CLAIMS ONLY IN YOUR INDIVIDUAL CAPACITY AND NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY PURPORTED CLASS, REPRESENTATIVE, OR PRIVATE ATTORNEY GENERAL PROCEEDING. If this class action waiver is deemed unenforceable, the entire arbitration agreement shall be null and void.

data.name: Section9_Title
data.value: 9. GOVERNING LAW & VENUE

data.name: Section9_Content
data.value: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, without regard to its conflict of laws principles. Subject to the arbitration agreement above, you consent to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the state and federal courts located in Wilmington, Delaware, for any non‚Äëarbitrable disputes.

data.name: Section10_Title
data.value: 10. MODIFICATIONS & UPDATES

data.name: Section10_Content
data.value: We may revise these Terms from time to time. The most current version will always be posted on this page with an updated ‚Äúeffective‚Äù date. By continuing to access or use the Service after revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised Terms. If you do not agree, you must stop using the Service immediately.

data.name: Section11_Title
data.value: 11. SURVIVAL & SEVERABILITY

data.name: Section11_Content
data.value: All provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination shall survive, including but not limited to ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability. If any provision is held invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
